description: a(n) = smallest positive integer not already in sequence such that the partial sum a(1)+...+a(n) is prime.
comments: 1 is the only odd number in this sequence. - _Derek Orr_, Feb 07 2015
mathematica: t = {2}; Do[i = 1; While[! PrimeQ[Total[t] + i] || MemberQ[t, i], i++]; AppendTo[t, i], {65}]; t (* _Jayanta Basu_, Jul 04 2013 *)
author: _Henry Bottomley_, May 09 2000
